name: LittleTikesPlayBigSkill
0:
”Alexa, play little tikes”
”Alexa, open little tikes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: little tikes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now your child can choose their own adventures with the Little Tikes Play Big Skill. They can ride their Rocking Horse through the desert or into the jungle. Visit the zoo in their Cozy Coupe and pretend to feed the giraffes! Cook up some fun recipes in their Little Tikes Kitchen, like pizza and scrambled eggs, and practice all kinds of new moves on their Trampoline. Your child will use their imagination and move their bodies! A variety of choices make the experience different every time they play, so they’ll want to play again and again. Where will their imagination take them next?
 
Go to the settings in your Alexa app and turn on Child Directed Skills
To start playing, say "Alexa, play Little Tikes,” then follow the prompts.
 
Little Tikes toys included in the skill:
Cozy Coupe (Including Princess Carriage and Ladybug) 
Rocking Horse
Kitchen
Trampoline
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
